title: Lueduo Diren De Xin
sinopse: Caught by the enemy, Kasan is forced to be a slave of the master Igen that killed his family. Only Kasan doesn't know this which is because he is left in the dark about that knowledge. Not only is his body a slave of his master but soon enough is heart is also stolen. Though his master Igen intent this to get his use out of Kasan he stumbles on the fact he also can no longer sleep without Kasan by his side.
